languages.text: "Ты стоишь десятка арбитров — тебе не приговор надо выносить, а дать полномочий побольше. Вот будь они у тебя, что бы ты сделал?"
"You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"
languages.original_text: "Ты стоишь десятка арбитров — тебе не приговор надо выносить, а дать полномочий побольше. Вот будь они у тебя, что бы ты сделал?"

traits.locale_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"
"You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"
"You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"
"You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"
"You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

languages.text: 「君にはアービトレイター10人分に匹敵する価値がある。君にふさわしいのは死刑などではなく、より大きな力だ。もし力を手にしたら、君は何をする？」
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: 「君にはアービトレイター10人分に匹敵する価値がある。君にふさわしいのは死刑などではなく、より大きな力だ。もし力を手にしたら、君は何をする？」

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein Dutzend Arbitratoren wert. Ihr verdient nicht die Todesstrafe, sondern mehr Macht. Wenn Ihr sie hättet, was würdet Ihr damit tun?"
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein Dutzend Arbitratoren wert. Ihr verdient nicht die Todesstrafe, sondern mehr Macht. Wenn Ihr sie hättet, was würdet Ihr damit tun?"

languages.text: « Vous valez bien une douzaine d'arbitrators. Vous ne méritez pas la mort. Vous méritez qu'on vous accorde davantage de pouvoir. Si vous aviez ce pouvoir, qu'en feriez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous valez bien une douzaine d'arbitrators. Vous ne méritez pas la mort. Vous méritez qu'on vous accorde davantage de pouvoir. Si vous aviez ce pouvoir, qu'en feriez-vous ? »

languages.text: «Vale usted por una docena de Arbitrator. Lo que merece no es una sentencia de muerte, sino más poder. ¿Qué haría con él si lo tuviera?».
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: «Vale usted por una docena de Arbitrator. Lo que merece no es una sentencia de muerte, sino más poder. ¿Qué haría con él si lo tuviera?».

languages.text: “你一个人就能抵得上十几个法务官。你得到的不该是死刑，而应该是更大的权力。如果你得到了权力，你会做什么？”
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: “你一个人就能抵得上十几个法务官。你得到的不该是死刑，而应该是更大的权力。如果你得到了权力，你会做什么？”

languages.text: "Sense onlarca Yargıcı'ya bedelsin. Hak ettiğin şey de bir ölüm cezası değil, daha yüce bir güç. Bu elinde olsaydı ne yapardın?"
languages.original_text: "You are worth a dozen Arbitrators. It is not a death sentence you deserve but greater power. If you had it, what would you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Sense onlarca Yargıcıya bedelsin. Hak ettiğin şey de bir ölüm cezası değil, daha yüce bir güç. Bu elinde olsaydı ne yapardın?"
